actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, to modify the treatment of applications for projects to construct new State homes, and for other purposes.
short_title: Veteran State Home Grant Backlog Reduction Act of 2017

summary.text:
Veteran State Home Grant Backlog Reduction Act of 2017

This bill revises project priority criteria for states seeking Department of Veterans Affairs funds to construct new state veterans homes that provide nursing home, domiciliary, or adult day care.
